state.memberList: []Address // all the recipients of this dividend
state.members: [Address]Int64 // all the recipient factors of this dividend
state.owner: AgentId // owner, only one who can call 'member' func
state.totalFactor: Int64 // sum of all recipient factors

params.owner: ?AgentId // optional owner, defaults to contract creator

member.access: owner // only defined owner can add members

setOwner.access: owner // only defined owner can change owner

params.owner: AgentId // new owner of smart contract
